Command.Name: start of typing long command
Command.Help: This command signals the browser that the user is about to start typing a command

Cut.Name: cut selection to clipboard
Cut.Help: This command cuts the selection to the clipboard

Copy.Name: copy selection to clipboard
Copy.Help: This command copies the selection to the clipboard

Paste.Name: paste clipboard to current widget
Paste.Help: This command pastes the selection to the current widget

ToggleMenubar.Name: show/hide menubar
ToggleMenubar.Help: This command toggle the visible attribute of the menubar
